revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{bor|en|fj|yaqona}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|en|/jɑˈɡoʊnə/}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|en|yaqona}} {{qual|Fiji}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-|s}} # {{lb|en|mostly|in the Pacific islands}} The [[kava]] plant. # {{lb|en|mostly|in the Pacific islands}} The drink made from the [[kava]] plant. #* '''2003''' [http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=P4NNd8NV6GMC&pg=PA380&dq=yagona&lr=&as_brr=3&sig=ACfU3U0XbvGMfZn4znHCDih8gz7hTT6NLQ ''Migration in the Asia Pacific: Population, Settlement and Citizenship Issues'' - Page 380] #*: Indo-Fijians have taken to drinking '''yagona''' or kava, the traditional drink in Fiji. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=aagnoy|Nagoya}} [[Category:en:Beverages]] [[Category:en:Piperales order plants]] ---- ==Uzbek== ===Etymology=== {{inh+|uz|chg|یگانه}}, from {{der|uz|fa|یگانه}}. ===Adjective=== {{uz-variant|c=ягона}} {{uz-adj}} # [[only]], [[sole]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|uz|yagonalik}}
